tool_description: Newsinapp is an API which allows you to add relevant news from topics into your apps.
name: newsinapp.io
title: newsinapp.io

api_list.name: Subscribe a topic
api_list.description: Subscribe a topic in order to get news about it.

required_parameters.name: topic_id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier of the topic to subscribe to.

api_list.name: Create a topic
api_list.description: Create a new topic. Before creating it be, sur this topics does not already exist with search method. When you create a topic, you automatically subscibe to it.

optional_parameters.name: entity
optional_parameters.description: Entity related to the topic you are about to create.
